root.output

Class KeyAsValueSequenceFileInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.SequenceFileInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.SequenceFileAsTextInputFormat
          • root.output.KeyAsValueSequenceFileInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>

    public class KeyAsValueSequenceFileInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.SequenceFileAsTextInputFormat

    This Sequence File Input Format allows the reading of an input file formatted where the key is effectively ignored and all data is stored in the value.

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
